org.apache.commons.imaging.formats.jpeg.xmp
Class JpegXmpRewriter

java.lang.Object

              org.apache.commons.imaging.formats.jpeg.xmp.JpegXmpRewriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
JpegConstants
public class JpegXmpRewriter
extends JpegRewriter

Interface for Exif write/update/remove functionality for Jpeg/JFIF images.

Method Detail

removeXmpXml

public void removeXmpXml(File src,
                         OutputStream os)
                  throws ImageReadException,
                         IOException
Reads a Jpeg image, removes all XMP XML (by removing the APP1 segment), and writes the result to a stream.

Parameters:
src - Image file.
os - OutputStream to write the image to.
Throws:
ImageReadException
IOException
See Also:
File, OutputStream
